name: Duolingo simplfied
description:
A clean, streamlined layout for Duolingo that reduces visual clutter and premium-upgrade notices. 


- Updated 9/1/2020 (Fixes for various site updates)
- Updated 7/6/2020 (Fixes for main skill tree area clicking, hide other new popup graphics)
- Updated 4/30/2020 (Support changes to main skill trees area, hide more ads)
- Updated 3/17/2020 (Removed more lesson tree popups, fixed practice button that had moved back to the bottom of the lesson tree.)
- Updated 3/11/2020 (Removed some of the new popup characters that appear during lessons, and mis-lesson popups)
- Updated 2/18/2020 (Support changes to main skill trees area)
